DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you end combat with #b10 or more #yHyperdimensional #yLinks, a random card will be upgraded.

DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, gain #b

VUPShionMod:AnastasiaCorePower.NAME: Anastasia Core
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, gain #b
[E] and draw a card whenever you play a #yFunnel card.

VUPShionMod:AttackInitiationPower.NAME: Initialize
DESCRIPTIONS: For the next #b%d cards this turn, draw #b1 card whenever you play a card.

VUPShionMod:ReleaseFormKuroisuPower.NAME: Liberated Form: Cloyce
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, put #b%d #yQuick #ySkim on the top of your draw pile.

VUPShionMod:UpgradedReleaseFormKuroisuPo.NAME: Liberated Form: Cloyce+
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, put #b%d #yQuick #ySkim+ on the top of your draw pile.

VUPShionMod:BleedingPower.NAME: Bleeding
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes #b%d additional damage from Attacks this turn. NL This status halves at the end of turn.

VUPShionMod:DenergizePower.NAME: Denergize
DESCRIPTIONS: Next turn, lose #b

VUPShionMod:TempFinFunnelUpgradePower.NAME: Temporary Total Upgrade（弃用）
DESCRIPTIONS: #yTotal #yUpgrade is increased by #b%d this turn.

VUPShionMod:ReleaseFormMinamiPower.NAME: Liberated Form: Minami
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you trigger the passive ability of #yFunnel by cards, trigger #b%d additional times.

VUPShionMod:EnhancedWeaponPower.NAME: Intensified
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you trigger #yLoading #yComplete ,draw #b%d card(s).

VUPShionMod:ReleaseFormLiyezhuPower.NAME: Liberated Form: Liyezhu
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn,gain #b%d #yHyperdimensional, gain again at the start of each of your turn. NL At the end of your turn, deal damage #b%d times as much as your #yHyperdimensional #yLink .

VUPShionMod:LockOnPower.NAME: Locked On
DESCRIPTIONS: This enemy takes #b%d additional damage from Attacks.

VUPShionMod:AttackOrderAlphaPower.NAME: Order: Aggressive
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage dealt by #yFunnel each turn is increased by #b%d times. NL Incompatible with other Orders.

VUPShionMod:AttackOrderBetaPower.NAME: Order: Concussive
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage dealt by #yFunnel each turn now hit ALL enemies. NL Incompatible with other Orders.

VUPShionMod:AttackOrderGammaPower.NAME: Order: Harrasing
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage dealt by #yFunnel each turn now also applies #b2 #yBleeding . NL Incompatible with other Orders.

VUPShionMod:AttackOrderDeltaPower.NAME: Order: Versatile
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage dealt by #yFunnel each turn now grants you equal #yBlock . NL Incompatible with other Orders.

VUPShionMod:DelayAvatarPower.NAME: Lure
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yLure has #b%d HP remaining. NL It deals #b%d damage #b5 times to ALL enemies upon being destroyed.

VUPShionMod:CrackOfTimePower.NAME: Fissure in Time
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you trigger #yLoading #yComplete , gain #b%d #yBlock .

VUPShionMod:AnticoagulationPower.NAME: Anticoagulated
DESCRIPTIONS: For the next #b%d turns, #yBleeding does not half at the end of turn.

VUPShionMod:LoseFinFunnelUpgradePower.NAME: All Out
DESCRIPTIONS: For the next #b%d turns, #yTotal #yUpgrade is set to 0.

VUPShionMod:HolyCoffinSinkingSpiritPower.NAME: Holy Coffin
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain or lose #yHyperdimensional #yLink , gain #b%d Block .

VUPShionMod:HolyCoffinReleasePower.NAME: Suspended
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you trigger #yLoading #yComplete ,gain #b%d #yHyperdimensional #yLink.

VUPShionMod:LoseHyperdimensionalLinksPow.NAME: Lose Hyperdimensional Link
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the next #b%d turns, lose ALL #yHyperdimensional #yLink .

VUPShionMod:DoubleCardPower.NAME: Anastasia Program
DESCRIPTIONS: Next #b%d card(s) is played twice.
